p.k: Short, Comedy, Fantasy France (2017). Hrají: Sylvain Dieuaide, Lou de Laâge, Ophélia Kolb. Režie: Axel Courtiere.
p.d: Oscar Mongoűt, a gourmet cannibal, burns with love for a neighbor in his building, the very vegetal Miss Carrot. But this passion seems destined to fail: she is vegetarian, while he has a severe case of vegetable phobia. Things take a drastic turn the evening she invites him to dinner.
